00066         friend bool operator == (const Matrix& lhs, const Matrix& rhs) {
00067             size_type row = lhs.end() - lhs.begin();

00364         template <typename UF>
00365         Matrix& apply (UF f) {
00366             for(unsigned int i=0; i < R; i++){
00367                 for(unsigned int j=0; j < C; j++){
00368                         m[i][j] = f(m[i][j]);
00369                         }
00370                 }
00371             return *this;}
